name: Temperate
description: Moderate temperatures with distinct seasons, including warm summers and cold winters

name: Mediterranean
description: Hot and dry in summer, mild and wet in winter

name: Continental
description: Large temperature variations between summer and winter, often with snowy winters

name: Tropical
description: Warm and humid year-round, with distinct wet and dry seasons

name: Subtropical
description: Hot summers and mild winters, often humid with occasional dry spells

name: Desert
description: Very hot and dry during the day, with cool nights, and minimal rainfall

name: Oceanic
description: Mild temperatures year-round, with frequent rain and high humidity

name: Montane
description: Cooler temperatures with increased altitude, and variable rainfall depending on elevation

name: Polar
description: Extremely cold year-round, with short, cool summers and long, harsh winters

name: Equatorial
description: Consistently warm and wet year-round, with very little seasonal variation
